mapper.insert: insert into messages (send_user_id, recv_user_id, title, content) values (#{send_user_id}, #{recv_user_id}, #{title}, #{content});
mapper.select: select m.msg_id, us.nickname as send_nickname, m.title, m.send_time, m.read_chk from messages m left join user u on u.user_id = m.recv_user_id left join user us on us.user_id = m.send_user_id where m.recv_user_id = #{recv_user_id} order by msg_id desc;
select send_user_id, title, content, read_chk from messages where msg_id=#{msg_id};
mapper.update: update messages set read_chk=0 where msg_id=#{msg_id};
